# go_term2name { #geneinfo.go_term2name }

```python
geneinfo.go_term2name(term)
```

Converts a GO term to its name.

<code>[**term**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[str](`str`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   GO term

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

<code>[]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[str](`str`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>
